output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential trap due to a potential integer overflow.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential trap due to a potential integer overflow.
buy function does not check return value of msg.sender.send(), allowing a potential trap due to a potential integer overflow.
sell function does not check return value of msg.sender.send(), allowing a potential trap due to a potential integer overflow.
transfer function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control for 'frozenAccount'.
